trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around December 14th 1998
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my friends party camping out outside, and I first noticed a hovering,moderately large hovering blue object, it kind of glowed, and at first i thoughtit was a light from a plane until it just hovered above and wasnt moving. Ibegan to panic as it got closer, but then it backed up and disappeared, my twofriends spotted it as well, as we were a bit scared.
